荎字的基本解释

荎
chí
〔荎蕏〕即“五味子”，一种落叶藤本植物，果实入药。
刺榆，一种小枝有坚硬枝刺的落叶小乔木。

荎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chí］
［《廣韻》直尼切，平脂，澄。］
［《廣韻》徒結切，入屑，定。］
(1)见“荎藸”。
(2)木名。即刺榆。

荎字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　荎； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1031第04
【唐韻】直尼切【集韻】陳尼切，?音治。【爾雅·釋草】菋，荎蕏。【註】荎蕏，五味子。【本草註】《抱朴子》云：五味者五行之精，其子有五味。　又木名。【詩·唐風】山有樞。【傳】樞，荎也。今之刺楡。　又【博雅】牛荎，牛膝也。　又徒結切，音跌。義同。

荎字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
荎字的起名意思

指荎蕏，即“五味子”，一种落叶藤本植物，果实入药，或指刺榆，一种小枝有坚硬枝刺的落叶小乔木。

Xian
Basic explanation of words
Xian
chí
〔Nectropus chinensis〕 means "Schisandra", a deciduous vine plant whose fruit is used as medicine.
Prickly elm, a small deciduous tree with hard branches and thorns.
Xian
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chí］
["Guangyun" Zhiniqie, flat fat, clear. ]
["Guangyun" only knots, cuts, and sets. ]
(1) See "Xianghu".
(2) Wooden name. That is thorn elm.
Xian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　荎; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1031 04
【Tang Yun】Zhi Niche 【Ji Yun】Chen Niche,? Yinzhi. 【Erya·Shucao】菋, 莏菋. [Note] Nymphoides, Schisandra. [Materia Medica] "Baopuzi" says: The five flavors are the essence of the five elements, and their sons have the five flavors.　Also wooden name. 【Poetry·Tangfeng】Mountains have pivots. [Biography] Shu, Xian Ye. Today's thorn tree.　[Bo Ya] Niu, achyranthes.　The knot is cut again, and the sound drops. The same meaning.
Xian

Xian
Name meaning
Refers to Nasturtium tuberosum, namely "Schisandra", a deciduous vine plant whose fruit is used as medicine, or refers to Elm, a small deciduous tree with small branches and thorns.
chí, zhì
